weeklyTopNews.title: What will Australiaâ€™s COVID vaccination program look like? 4 key questions answered
weeklyTopNews.summary: Learn what Australia's vaccination program could look like.

weeklyTopNews.title: SA Chief Public Health Officer Nicola Spurrier apologises for wrongly suggesting man breached coronavirus quarantine
weeklyTopNews.summary: She clarified that the individual was under no obligation to be in quarantine and no one had told him to do so.

weeklyTopNews.title: South Australia goes on COVID-19 testing blitz after infected man breaches quarantine
weeklyTopNews.summary: Visitors to a number of popular shopping centres in suburban Adelaide are being asked to test for COVID-19 after a man with coronavirus breached quarantine to visit them.

weeklyTopNews.title: South Australia records two new coronavirus cases linked to known cluster
weeklyTopNews.summary: The two people were already in quarantine and the parafield cluster has now expanded to 33 people.

weeklyTopNews.title: Victoria officially 'eliminates' COVID-19, after recording 28 straight days without a new infection
weeklyTopNews.summary: Victoria has met the official milestone for 'eliminating' the coronavirus by recoding 28 days without a new infection. Victorians will also now be able to visit Tasmania for the first time in more than 8 months.

weeklyTopNews.title: Coronavirus alerts issued for two SA shopping centres as Black Friday puts authorities on edge
weeklyTopNews.summary: Shoppers attending today's Black Friday's sales have been urged by health authorities to wear masks.

weeklyTopNews.title: Victoria is one day from eliminating coronavirus as Queensland and Tasmania set to reopen borders
weeklyTopNews.summary: Victoria extended its streak to 27 days with zero new coronavirus cases.

weeklyTopNews.title: South Australia confirms new Covid case after announcing hotel quarantine reforms
weeklyTopNews.summary: The new case is a student from Woodville High School. Anyone that attended the school on Monday has been asked to isolate.
